abstract: Still, GE Capital is in transition. General Electric has moved to shrink the unit’s balance sheet, replacing riskier assets with a sleepy banking deposit division.
snippet: Still, GE Capital is in transition. General Electric has moved to shrink the unit’s balance sheet, replacing riskier assets with a sleepy banking deposit division.
lead_paragraph: GE Capital weighed heavy on General Electric during the financial crisis.

headline.main: Once a Millstone, GE Capital Is Now a Profit Center
